pullRequest.title: Fix(tests): Fix controller tests and add more.
pullRequest.bodyText: All the tests were issuing get requests.  Updated the tests to issue the correct controller REST calls.

commit.message: Fix(tests): Fix controller tests and add more.

nodes.bodyText: I used to be in favor of checking the substrings in messages, but now I worry that it causes us to need to update the tests too often, which, in turn, causes the tests to be less valuable. I would be more comfortable having the fail at line 41 and nothing in the catch block (maybe an assertNotNull).

commit.message: Refactor(tests): Use composition rather than inheritance for test setup.
